content: join the divine debris newsletter so you never miss a free pattern release 1 > **please note ** the graph for this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 2 **description ** colorful movement is the star of the show in this fun and bright wall hanging this design is another abstract divine debris creation allowing each crocheter to bring their own personality to the design in colors and details as they d like as simple as single crochets and color changes this pattern is worked in one piece and any finishing details after are yours to pick the sample in the photos is the was made using brava worsted by we crochet 3 affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2021 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //view flodesk com/pages/5f332ef6307c1600262237d9 2 https //divinedebris com/follow-the-moon-wall-hanging-free-crochet-pattern-by-divine-debris/ 3 https //shrsl com/2m37z
